s.text: Center staff assists with the housing search, school decisions, drivers' licenses, leisure time activities, and daycare.
Your gift to ICI will help us meet this challenge.
At the International Center we are proud to welcome newcomers to our city whether they come to live with us or to learn from us.
Indianapolis is a city of many voices and many faces.
In central Indiana today we hear unfamiliar languages and see the faces of newcomers who are making our city their home.
The attendance of more than 16,000 at the International Festival confirmed our belief in our own festival publicity "Many Faces, One World.
Joe Tanner, President Caterina Blitzer Board of Directors Executive Director
Ambassador to the United States from Hungary His Excellency Geza Jeszenszky was present to add his accolades that evening.
